item.title: Automate MDE Extension Status Checks with PowerShell
item.description: In this blog, I will dive into an automated approach for efficiently retrieving the installation status of MDE extensions (MDE.Windows or MDE.Linux) on Azure VMs safeguarded by Defender for Servers (P1 or P2) plans. This method not only streamlines the monitoring process but also ensures that your critical endpoints are continuously protected with the latest Defender capabilities. By leveraging automation, you can quickly identify any discrepancies or gaps in extension deployment, allowing for swift remediation and fortifying your organization’s security posture.
